original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edge up in mid day trade on Friday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed
The main All Share Price Index was up 0.38 percent or 43.46 points to 11,625.80, the most liquid index S&P SL20 was up 0.54 percent or 18.21 points to 3,407.88
Gainers during mid day trade were John Keells Holdings, Aitken Spence & Dialog. (Colombo/Aug04/2023)
